channel.title: Primal Pk - Small Open Beta
channel.description:
Hey guys,
I'm releasing the Open Beta of my server Primal Pk. Nothing huge or fancy. It's a 317 Eco Pk server with a lot of PvM content. Come check it out. We've just finished our alpha testing stages and we'd love for more people to help us find bugs and such so we can patch up the server before its official release. Also, if you have suggestions for the server, now would be a great time to help us add even more content to the server. If no dupes etc are found, there most likely will not be a reset.
Here's a link to the website: [url=http://www.primalpk.com/]PrimalPK[/url] Here's a link to the forums: [url=http://www.primalpk.com/forums/index.php]PrimalPk[/url] Here's a link to the Webclient: [url=http://www.primalpk.com/webclient.php]Primal Pk[/url] Here's a link to the Download Client: [url=http://www.primalpk.com/storage/PrimalPk.jar]http://www.primalpk.com/storage/PrimalPk.jar[/url]
Thanks,
Ava
Some pictures:
[URL=http://s1129.photobucket.com/user/holoreaper/media/Untitled-9_zps991aeec7.png.html][IMG]http://i1129.photobucket.com/albums/m503/holoreaper/Untitled-9_zps991aeec7.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://s1129.photobucket.com/user/holoreaper/media/Untitled-10_zpsdcf997fa.png.html][IMG]http://i1129.photobucket.com/albums/m503/holoreaper/Untitled-10_zpsdcf997fa.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://s1129.photobucket.com/user/holoreaper/media/Untitled-8_zps62e18e07.png.html][IMG]http://i1129.photobucket.com/albums/m503/holoreaper/Untitled-8_zps62e18e07.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://s1129.photobucket.com/user/holoreaper/media/Untitled-2_zps01c76fb5.png.html][IMG]http://i1129.photobucket.com/albums/m503/holoreaper/Untitled-2_zps01c76fb5.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://s1129.photobucket.com/user/holoreaper/media/Untitled-11_zps985237a4.png.html][IMG]http://i1129.photobucket.com/albums/m503/holoreaper/Untitled-11_zps985237a4.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://s1129.photobucket.com/user/holoreaper/media/Untitled-13_zpsb8f1abfa.png.html][IMG]http://i1129.photobucket.com/albums/m503/holoreaper/Untitled-13_zpsb8f1abfa.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://s1129.photobucket.com/user/holoreaper/media/Untitled-12_zpsf6397c74.png.html][IMG]http://i1129.photobucket.com/albums/m503/holoreaper/Untitled-12_zpsf6397c74.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://s1129.photobucket.com/user/holoreaper/media/Untitled-5_zpsc8332256.png.html][IMG]http://i1129.photobucket.com/albums/m503/holoreaper/Untitled-5_zpsc8332256.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://s1129.photobucket.com/user/holoreaper/media/Untitled-6_zps2e66d917.png.html][IMG]http://i1129.photobucket.com/albums/m503/holoreaper/Untitled-6_zps2e66d917.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://s1129.photobucket.com/user/holoreaper/media/Untitled-7_zps7674427d.png.html][IMG]http://i1129.photobucket.com/albums/m503/holoreaper/Untitled-7_zps7674427d.png[/img][/URL]

item.title: Primal Pk - Small Open Beta
item.dc:creator: @avalux avalux
item.description:
@avalux wrote:

Togasa:

It seems to me like you recently found out how to edit the size of an NPC in your client and went a lil overboard with it…

They’re pets ingame.

Read full topic

item.title: Primal Pk - Small Open Beta
item.dc:creator: @avalux avalux
item.description:
@avalux wrote:

shaun123430:

Do I see Un-teleblock as a command…?

It’s meant to make pk’ing faster for donators and only works outside of the wilderness.
If it turns out to be a problem I can always remove it.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Togasa Togasa
item.description:

Do I see Un-teleblock as a command…?

lmao nice catch… donors get all the perks

item.title: Primal Pk - Small Open Beta
item.dc:creator: @avalux avalux
item.description:
@avalux wrote:

Hey guys,

I’m releasing the Open Beta of my server Primal Pk. Nothing huge or fancy. It’s a 317 Eco Pk server with a lot of PvM content.
Come check it out. We’ve just finished our alpha testing stages and we’d love for more people to help us find bugs and such
so we can patch up the server before its official release. Also, if you have suggestions for the server, now would be a great time
to help us add even more content to the server. If no dupes etc are found, there most likely will not be a reset.

Here’s a link to the website: PrimalPK
Here’s a link to the forums: PrimalPk
Here’s a link to the Webclient: Primal Pk
Here’s a link to the Download Client: http://www.primalpk.com/storage/PrimalPk.jar

Thanks,

Ava
